Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui

Class LoginGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui.LoginGui
  • public class LoginGui
extends java.lang.Object
    It's the login window of the GUI, in which choose own nickname

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LoginGui()

      • printLoginMessage

        public void printLoginMessage​(java.lang.String text,
                              boolean loginSuccessful)
        Shows the login message;
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be written; it's green if loginSuccessful is true, otherwise is red
        loginSuccessful - The situation of the login

      • updateConnection

        public void updateConnection​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> connections)
        Create a text for each connected player, waiting for a new match to start
        Parameters:
